Name: Steel & Bone
About the game: Story You are a contract monster hunter tasked with clearing a mysterious aristocrat's dungeon, but you find the contract a much harder task than you previously thought it was... Features - Classes with different abilities - Different weapons. - Stealth mechanics. - Bosses. - Puzzles. - Deadly traps. And much, much more... Credits Steel & Bone is made by first-year game development students at Ahlman Institute and was made over approximately 3 months. Veikko Ruopio / Project Lead / Programmer / Sound & Music Santeri Suomi / Co-Code Lead / Programmer / Steam Publishing / Level Design Sami Sairiala / Co-Code Lead / Programmer / Steam Publishing / Level Design Lina Railio / Art Lead / Project Lead / Character Artist Aleksi Haapasalo / Programmer Viljo Mustalahti / Programmer Halil Kara / Programmer Aleksi Hassinen / 3D Artist Tatu Hyv√§rinen / UI Artist / Weapon Artist SPECIAL THANKS TO OUR MENTORS Risto Koskenkorva Antti Leinonen
